text: 11.12: Lu 16.16Jon kukuyɨ mɨŋaŋgɨruhɨru hama Gotɨndu kuyu ambavarami hɨrɨvɨyɨ nda kɨta, patavata tɨhu ndahara, kru saŋgandu tɨkatɨka naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ, Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmɨndaŋ vata tɨkatɨkatɨndu. Kamatɨndɨ muvitamuvita saŋga kurɨhandu. Kamata krunavundi Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ pɨmɨ aru ŋgundu.11.12 Grik kuyuyɨ kanɨŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm maŋambamaŋgarami. Kru muvɨra nurɨŋandɨ indarɨmitɨyɨ, tɨhu ambandu. Jisas ambami. Kru yaŋɨrɨm idarɨmaŋgarandu haŋɨnɨŋ ambɨtɨn, Rom hati naŋga kurɨhata nurɨŋ pɨŋguvarɨmandɨyu. Kamata Gotɨndu kwɨmbɨ mɨŋasɨrɨvɨtu muhɨmɨmuhɨm nuŋandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨhɨyɨ haŋɨnɨŋ pɨrɨ nɨñɨ yɨvurahɨmandɨ, vamba ambami, vandu.
